item.title: Monsoon chaos in Raichur: Streams in spate
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
Raichur: The district has been witnessing severe monsoon rainfall since Wednesday night, leading to streams overflowing in various areas.Hirehalla stream near Manvi town along the Raichur-Sindhanur state highway overflowed, disrupting traffic flow. Construction activities are ongoing on the state highway from Sath Mile Cross to Sindhanur in Manvi, including a bridge near Bashamiya College. A KKRTC bus was stuck in water, blocking traffic for several hours and hindering public movement.Near...]]>
item.author: Tnn
